name: Rabbit Race (tatsoni)
description:
Rabbit Race is a hotseat side-scroller where characters move one frame at a time. Choose the right frame to avoid falling and be the winning rabbit! Created for a Aalto University 4 hr game jam with the theme Weird Input.

Art and sounds by: https://sjukpension.itch.io/

HOW TO PLAY: Player 1:

Use S F E D to cycle through the animation and V to reverse.

Player 2:

Use ← → ↑↓ to cycle through the animation and Q to reverse.

Get five points to be the winning rabbit!
